query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS security_alerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type ENUM('failed_login', 'suspicious_activity', 'data_exfiltration', 'unauthorized_access', 'malware_detected', 'policy_violation', 'critical_threat') NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  status ENUM('new', 'acknowledged', 'resolved', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolved_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_severity (severity),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS security_alerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type ENUM('failed_login', 'suspicious_activity', 'data_exfiltration', 'unauthorized_access', 'malware_detected', 'policy_violation', 'critical_threat') NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  status ENUM('new', 'acknowledged', 'resolved', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolved_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_severity (severity),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
)
